DOC.brief_summary: This prospective observational study evaluate efficacy safety first-line Avastin ( bevacizumab ) combination platinum-based chemotherapy different age group ( < 60 , 60-69 , 70-79 , > 80 year ) patient inoperable advanced , metastatic recurrent adenocarcinoma non-small cell lung cancer . Patients follow 18 month start first-line therapy .
